entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 3 with temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few wet flurries over southern sections. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 this afternoon. High plus 3 with temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy. Local amount 5 cm near the Rockies. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
